Direzione o partecipazione alle attivit\.content: partecipazione progetto di ricerca internazionale finanziato dalla Dutch Science Foundation (NWO) (VIDI grant 452-10-012). Principal investigator Prof. Melinda Mills
Partecipazione a progetto di ricerca internazionale: ERC Consolidator Grant SOCIOGENOME (615603), Principal Investigator Prof. Melinda Mills

Responsabilita' scientifica per progetti.content: Co-applicant, Large Networking Collaborative Project, FP7-SSH-2012 European Research Council (ERC), “FamiliesAndSocieties Changing Families and Sustainable Societies: Policy contexts and diversity over the life course and across generations.” Led by L.Olah University of Stockholm. Co-applicant (together with Prof. M. Mills) and co-leader of Working Package: The changing role of children and societal implications: Assisted reproduction, late fertility and childlessness.
Co-applicant, NCRM grant SOCGEN: “Combining Social Science and Molecular Genetic Research to Examine Inequality and the Life Course.” PI Prof. M. Mills

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Premio miglior tesi di laurea. Centro servizi per il volontariato. Provincia di Padova.
Non-Stipendiary Research Fellow, Nuffield College. University of Oxford, UK
